# 8th Grade p5.js

Code goes in <kbd>Code Examples</kbd>, lessons go in <kbd>_posts</kbd> or as Markdown files in the top level. 

**Lesson/Post Header**
```html
---
layout: "post"
title: "Hello World"
date: "2016-04-18 13:05"
---
```

**Page Header**
```html
---
layout: "page"
title: "Crazy Framerate"
---
```

Site is built using [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/).
